info.name: CommerceIQ
info.description: APIs description for CommerceIQ mini Project.

request.description:
Return List of All the Entity.
Two ways to call the Get API

http://jayeshkeshri.pythonanywhere.com/<entity>

Add new Entity by passing Entity payload. Entity id must be unique.

http://jayeshkeshri.pythonanywhere.com/<entity>

with Payload

Patch Entity Request Pass ID and DATA

http://jayeshkeshri.pythonanywhere.com/<entity>/<id>

with payload

Delete a Entity by passing id

http://jayeshkeshri.pythonanywhere.com/<entity>/<id>

PUT request for Entity by id.

http://jayeshkeshri.pythonanywhere.com/<entity>/<id>

with payload

sort entity by passing key.

e.g http://jayeshkeshri.pythonanywhere.com/<entiry>?_sort=<some_key>&_order=<asc_or_dsc>


_sort=<some_key>&order=<asc_or_dsc>

Get Request for Searching key in entity.

http://jayeshkeshri.pythonanywhere.com/<entity>?q=<key>
